attributes.action: Take GMTV & Co off the air, and replace with live pole dancing,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country is damned if the drivel (unfortunatley watched by daytime viewers) continues from GMTV and its following shows(!). Dumbing down, is this a deliberate ploy ?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
